TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComparable`1<- T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IComparable

span.span: The type of object to compare.

summary.span: 定義通用的比較方法，實值類型或類別會實作這個方法，以建立特定類型的比較方法來排序其執行個體。

span.span: Defines a generalized comparison method that a value type or class implements to create a type-specific comparison method for ordering or sorting its instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此介面由可以排列或排序其值的型別所實作，並提供強型別的比較方法，來排序的泛型集合物件的成員。This interface is implemented by types whose values can be ordered or sorted and provides a strongly typed comparison method for ordering members of a generic collection object. 例如，一個數字可能會大於第二個數字，和一個字串可以出現在另一個之前的字母順序。For example, one number can be larger than a second number, and one string can appear in alphabetical order before another. 它需要實作的類型會定義單一方法，指出是否目前的執行個體在排序次序的位置之前，之後，或是與相同類型的第二個物件相同。It requires that implementing types define a single method, , that indicates whether the position of the current instance in the sort order is before, after, or the same as a second object of the same type. 一般而言，直接從開發人員程式碼不被呼叫方法。Typically, the method is not called directly from developer code. 相反地，它會自動呼叫方法這類和。Instead, it is called automatically by methods such as and . 一般而言，型別，提供實作也實作介面。Typically, types that provide an implementation also implement the interface. 介面會定義方法，可判斷是否相等的實作類型的執行個體。The interface defines the method, which determines the equality of instances of the implementing type. 實作方法必須傳回具有三個值之一下, 表所示。The implementation of the method must return an that has one of three values, as shown in the following table. |值Value|意義Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |小於零Less than zero|此物件位於所指定的物件在排序次序的方法。This object precedes the object specified by the method in the sort order.| |零Zero|此目前執行個體，就會發生在相同位置中的排序次序所指定的物件為方法引數。This current instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as the object specified by the method argument.| |大於零Greater than zero|此目前執行個體所指定的物件會遵循方法引數，在排序次序。This current instance follows the object specified by the method argument in the sort order.| 所有數字類型 (例如並) 實作，就像一樣， ，和。All numeric types (such as and ) implement , as do , , and . 自訂類型應該也會提供其自己實作的排列或排序的物件執行個體。Custom types should also provide their own implementation of to enable object instances to be ordered or sorted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何實作簡單`Temperature`物件。The following code example illustrates the implementation of for a simple `Temperature` object. 此範例會建立與字串集合`Temperature`物件索引鍵，並將溫度和字串的數個組加入至順序清單。The example creates a collection of strings with `Temperature` object keys, and adds several pairs of temperatures and strings to the list out of sequence. 在呼叫方法中，集合會使用實作，以排序清單項目，然後會遞增溫度的順序顯示。In the call to the method, the collection uses the implementation to sort the list entries, which are then displayed in order of increasing temperature. [!code-cpp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 取代的型別參數介面實作這個介面的型別。如果您實作，您應該多載， ， ，並運算子傳回值，都必須配合。此外，您也應該實作。請參閱文章的完整資訊。

Replace the type parameter of the interface with the type that is implementing this interface. If you implement , you should overload the , , , and operators to return values that are consistent with . In addition, you should also implement . See the article for complete information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(!T other) cil managed
Public Function CompareTo (other As T) As Integer

param.name: other
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 將目前的執行個體與相同類型的另一個物件相比較，並傳回整數，這個整數表示目前的執行個體在排序次序中，位於另一個物件之前、之後或相同位置。

span.span: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.

returns.span: 值，表示所比較之物件的相對順序。

span.span: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared.

returns.span:
傳回值具有這些意義： 值 意義
小於零 這個執行個體位於 之前。
零 這個執行個體出現在排序次序中的位置和 相同。
大於零 這個執行個體在排序次序中會在 之後。

span.span:
The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning
Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order.
Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as .
Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供強型別的比較方法，來排序的泛型集合物件的成員。 provides a strongly typed comparison method for ordering members of a generic collection object. 因此，它通常不稱為直接從開發人員程式碼。Because of this, it is usually not called directly from developer code. 相反地，它會自動呼叫方法這類和。Instead, it is called automatically by methods such as and . 這個方法是只定義，而且必須實作特定類別或實值類型的影響。This method is only a definition and must be implemented by a specific class or value type to have effect. 傳回的值取決於特定實作的 （「 之前 」、"發生在相同位置中，"和"遵循） 一節中所指定的比較的意義。The meaning of the comparisons specified in the Return Values section ("precedes", "occurs in the same position as", and "follows) depends on the particular implementation. 根據定義，任何物件都會比較大於`null`，並比較彼此相等的兩個 null 參考。By definition, any object compares greater than `null`, and two null references compare equal to each other. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何實作簡單`Temperature`物件。The following code example illustrates the implementation of for a simple `Temperature` object. 此範例會建立與字串集合`Temperature`物件索引鍵，並將溫度和字串的數個組加入至順序清單。The example creates a collection of strings with `Temperature` object keys, and adds several pairs of temperatures and strings to the list out of sequence. 在呼叫方法中，集合會使用實作，以排序清單項目，然後會遞增溫度的順序顯示。In the call to the method, the collection uses the implementation to sort the list entries, which are then displayed in order of increasing temperature. [!code-cpp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable\`1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable`1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 物件 A、 B 和 C，下列必須為 true: A.CompareTo(A)才能傳回零。如果A.CompareTo(B)傳回零，然後B.CompareTo(A)才能傳回零。如果A.CompareTo(B)會傳回零並B.CompareTo(C)傳回零，然後A.CompareTo(C)才能傳回零。如果A.CompareTo(B)傳回值不是零，然後B.CompareTo(A)才能傳回值的正負號相反。如果A.CompareTo(B)傳回值不等於零，和B.CompareTo(C)傳回的值做為相同的正負號的，然後a。CompareTo(C)才可傳回做為相同的正負號的值和。

For objects A, B, and C, the following must be true: A.CompareTo(A) is required to return zero. If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero, then B.CompareTo(A) is required to return zero. If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero and B.CompareTo(C) returns zero, then A.CompareTo(C) is required to return zero. If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value other than zero, then B.CompareTo(A) is required to return a value of the opposite sign. If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value that is not equal to zero, and B.CompareTo(C) returns a value of the same sign as , then A.CompareTo(C) is required to return a value of the same sign as and .
使用方法，以判斷類別的執行個體的順序。
Use the method to determine the ordering of instances of a class.
